meanings.sent1: She switched her blue pen for a red one.
meanings.sent2: He switched seats with his friend in class.
meanings.sent3: The magician switched the rabbit for a dove!
meanings.sent4: Her mood switched from happy to sad in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The weather switched suddenly from sunny to stormy.

meanings.sent1: The switched light illuminated the room.
meanings.sent2: The switched fan provided a cool breeze.
meanings.sent3: The switched TV seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: The switched stove was a safety hazard.
meanings.sent5: The switched alarm woke everyone up in a panic.

meanings.sent1: He switched the books from one shelf to another.
meanings.sent2: The team switched their strategy for the next game.
meanings.sent3: The cat switched its attention from the toy to a bug.
meanings.sent4: The focus switched from one speaker to another.
meanings.sent5: The power switched hands as the new leader emerged.

meanings.sent1: They switched their old phones for the latest models.
meanings.sent2: She switched her regular coffee with a latte today.
meanings.sent3: The kids switched their Halloween candies with each other.
meanings.sent4: The worn-out tires were switched for new ones.
meanings.sent5: The actors switched roles for the final performance.
